breast.transformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldOctopus(octopus-like)], [npc.nipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldOctopus(octopus milk)].
breast.crotchBoobsTransformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldOctopus(octopus-like)], [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldOctopus(octopus milk)].
